metadata.title: International Experience - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: We value the international mobility of our students as another fundamental strategy in the formation of leaders prepared to face the challenges of the globalized world.
content_blocks.subsection: We value the international mobility of our students as another fundamental strategy in the formation of leaders prepared to face the challenges of the globalized world.

content_blocks.text: An international experience contributes to a new understanding and perspective of the world, improves local language skills, broadens networking and develops socio-emotional skills such as adaptability and resilience.
content_blocks.subsection: We value the international mobility of our students as another fundamental strategy in the formation of leaders prepared to face the challenges of the globalized world.

content_blocks.text: Inteli's International Office is responsible for drawing up international agreements, providing guidance on academic mobility, creating courses in partnership with foreign institutions, and even welcoming students and lecturers from other nationalities.
content_blocks.subsection: We value the international mobility of our students as another fundamental strategy in the formation of leaders prepared to face the challenges of the globalized world.
